org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin7

Annotation Type FieldBuilder.AbstractTextField


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
@Documented
public static @interface FieldBuilder.AbstractTextField
    Specifies how a Java property should be edited in Vaadin using a AbstractTextField.
    See Also:
    FieldBuilder.AbstractField, FieldBuilder

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      int columns
      Get the number of columns.
      int maxLength
      Get the maximum length.
      String nullRepresentation
      Get the representation of null.
      boolean nullSettingAllowed
      Get whether null value may be set.
      AbstractTextField.TextChangeEventMode textChangeEventMode
      Get text change event mode.
      int textChangeTimeout
      Get text change event timeout.
      Class<? extends TextField> type
      Get the AbstractTextField type that will edit the property.

    • Element Detail

      • type

        public abstract Class<? extends TextField> type
        Get the AbstractTextField type that will edit the property.
        Default:
        com.vaadin.ui.TextField.class

      • nullRepresentation

        public abstract String nullRepresentation
        Get the representation of null.
        See Also:
        AbstractTextField.setNullRepresentation(java.lang.String)
        Default:
        "null"

      • nullSettingAllowed

        public abstract boolean nullSettingAllowed
        Get whether null value may be set.
        See Also:
        AbstractTextField.setNullSettingAllowed(boolean)
        Default:
        false

      • textChangeEventMode

        public abstract AbstractTextField.TextChangeEventMode textChangeEventMode
        Get text change event mode.
        See Also:
        AbstractTextField.setTextChangeEventMode(com.vaadin.ui.AbstractTextField.TextChangeEventMode)
        Default:
        com.vaadin.ui.AbstractTextField.TextChangeEventMode.LAZY

      • textChangeTimeout

        public abstract int textChangeTimeout
        Get text change event timeout.
        See Also:
        AbstractTextField.setTextChangeTimeout(int)
        Default:
        -1

        public abstract int columns
        Get the number of columns.
        See Also:
        AbstractTextField.setColumns(int)
        Default:

        Get the maximum length.
        See Also:
